mapper.select: SELECT CONTACT_SEQ, OWNER_EMAIL, "NAME", EMAIL, PHONE, CONTACT_GROUP, COMPANY_CODE, MEMO, IS_SHARE FROM contact ORDER BY CONTACT_SEQ DESC
SELECT CONTACT_SEQ, OWNER_EMAIL, "NAME", EMAIL, PHONE, CONTACT_GROUP, COMPANY_CODE, MEMO, IS_SHARE FROM contact WHERE OWNER_EMAIL = #{email}
SELECT CONTACT_SEQ, OWNER_EMAIL, "NAME", EMAIL, PHONE, CONTACT_GROUP, COMPANY_CODE, MEMO, IS_SHARE FROM contact WHERE OWNER_EMAIL = #{email} AND IS_SHARE = 'n' ORDER BY CONTACT_SEQ DESC

SELECT c.CONTACT_SEQ, c.OWNER_EMAIL, c."NAME", c.EMAIL, c.PHONE, c.CONTACT_GROUP, c.COMPANY_CODE, c.MEMO, c.IS_SHARE FROM contact c JOIN member m ON c.OWNER_EMAIL = m.EMAIL WHERE m.DEPT_CODE = #{dept_code} AND c.IS_SHARE = 'y' ORDER BY c.CONTACT_SEQ DESC
